title: NBA Star Jaylen Brown Calls for Player Equity
description: Jaylen Brown of the Boston Celtics, a four-time NBA All-Star, Finals MVP, entrepreneur and philanthropist says players should be allowed to build equity alongside owners, arguing the league’s labor rules lag far behind the wealth created by the sport. He speaks with Brooke Sutherland in Boston. (Source: Bloomberg)
